message_template: Dear {{customerName}}, thank you for your payment of {{amount}} on {{paymentDate}}. Your payment has been successfully received and updated in your account.
Dear {{customerName}}, your {{productName}} loan {{loanReference}} of {{amount}} has been issued. Please repay your loan by {{loanDueDate}}.
Dear {{customerName}}, your loan payment of {{amount}} is now {{daysOverdue}} days overdue. Please make the payment immediately to avoid further late fees and penalties.
Dear {{customerName}}, your loan of {{amount}} is due today. A late fee of {{lateFeeAmount}} will apply if not paid on time.
Dear {{customerName}}, this is a reminder that your loan payment of {{amount}} is due in {{daysUntilDue}} days. Please make the payment on time to avoid late fees.
Dear {{customerName}}, your loan application {{loanReference}} worth {{amount}} has been rejected. Please contact us for more information.
Dear {{customerName}}, your loan {{loanReference}} has been fully repaid. Thank you for your business.
